Uses of Class
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed.RandomSeederThread

  • Packages that use RandomSeederThread 
    Package Description
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng
    Subclasses of Random using different random-number generation algorithms.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.concurrent
    Implementations of Random designed to be used concurrently from multiple threads, backed by instances of SplittableRandom or ThreadLocal<?>.

    • Uses of RandomSeederThread in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng

      Fields in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng with type parameters of type RandomSeederThread 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<RandomSeederThread> BaseRandom.randomSeeder
      If the referent is non-null, it will be invoked to reseed this PRNG whenever random output is taken and BaseRandom.getEntropyBits() called immediately afterward would return zero or negative.
      Methods in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng that return RandomSeederThread 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RandomSeederThread BaseRandom.getRandomSeeder()
      Returns the current seed generator for this PRNG.
      Methods in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng with parameters of type RandomSeederThread 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void BaseRandom.setRandomSeeder​(RandomSeederThread randomSeeder)
      Registers this PRNG with the RandomSeederThread for the corresponding SeedGenerator, to schedule reseeding when we run out of entropy.
